attributes.action: Stop EU flag on Births, Deaths and Marriage certificates
attributes.additional_details:
EU unelected bureaucrats say this will be voluntary but we all know it is more erosion of our country via the back door. All birth, deaths and marriage certificates will have the crest and union jack removed to be replaced with this unwanted EU abomination.

I for one say enough is enough so please vote and put a stop to this and our government should listen to what we want and not to the unelected!
